医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
早期喂养实践是塑造终生口腔微生物群的关键研究深入探索了婴儿口腔微生物组的鲜为人知的世界，研究了早期营养和环境因素如何塑造它。该研究对终身健康具有影响，旨在指导未来的健康建议，强调需要更多的纵向研究和先进的测序技术。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230926/Early-feeding-practices-key-to-shaping-lifelong-oral-microbiome.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230926/Early-feeding-practices-key-to-shaping-lifelong-oral-microbiome.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e289debf-7caa-4ef3-97e5-308586fe64ab Tue, 26 Sep 2023 23:49:00 -0400 Early feeding practices key to shaping lifelong oral microbiome
蘑菇衍生产品能否成为预防肺癌的未来？研究人员发现，一种蘑菇衍生产品 GLSF 有望减少烟草烟雾致癌物引起的小鼠肺毒性和肿瘤发展。这项研究为未来的临床试验打开了大门，有可能提供一种天然的肺癌预防措施。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230926/Could-a-mushroom-衍生-产品-be-the-future-of-lung-cancer-prevention.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230926/Could-a-mushroom-衍生-产品-be-the-future-of-lung-cancer-prevention.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=80e28189-1090-4127-8806-d0e92bc84277 Tue, 26 Sep 2023 23:25:00 -0400 Could a mushroom-derived product be the future of lung cancer prevention?
你的海鲜安全吗？新研究揭示太平洋海洋生物的毒素水平惊人发表在《总体环境科学》杂志上的一篇研究论文探讨了太平洋水生动物体内残留毒素水平的增加如何对食品安全、人类健康和粮食保障造成严重风险。该文件概述了各种类型的毒素、其来源及其对海洋生物和人类健康的影响，强调了有效干预措施的紧迫性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230926/Is-your-seafood-safe-New-study-reveals-alarming-levels-of-toxins-in-Pacific-Ocean-marine-life.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230926/Is-your-seafood-safe-New-study-reveals-alarming-levels-of-toxins-in-Pacific-Ocean-marine-life.aspx#评论https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=80a9859b-5a43-45a3-b3bd-3cc755d322f4 Tue, 26 Sep 2023 23:07:00 -0400 Is your seafood safe? New study reveals alarming levels of toxins in Pacific Ocean marine life
“食品即药物”策略可以节省数十亿美元的医疗费用研究食品即医学 (FIM) 工作的专家表示，将有针对性的食品和营养策略纳入国家一级的医疗保健中将改善健康和生活质量，减少医院的工作量并降低医疗保健成本。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230926/Food-is-Medicine-strategies-could-save-billions-in-healthcare-costs.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230926/Food-is-Medicine-strategies-could-save-billions-in-healthcare-costs.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=4652db6c-d296-4c9b-b386-e0300f72ce36 Tue, 26 Sep 2023 23:04:15 -0400 Food is Medicine strategies could save billions in healthcare costs
新型细胞免疫疗法显示出对抗小鼠脑肿瘤的希望德国癌症研究中心（DKFZ）和曼海姆大学医学中心（UMM）的科学家首次成功测试了一种针对小鼠脑肿瘤的新型细胞免疫疗法。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230926/New-form-of-cellular-immunotherapy-shows-promise-against-brain-tumors-in-mice.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230926/New-form-of-cellular-immunotherapy-shows-promise-against-brain-tumors-in-mice.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=93b248b1-48b6-4d30-b165-37688e72a503 Tue, 26 Sep 2023 22:44:18 -0400 New form of cellular immunotherapy shows promise against brain tumors in mice
最新版本的健康饮食指数涵盖了幼儿饮食质量在爱思唯尔出版的《营养与饮食学杂志》上的四篇文章中，领先的营养专家描述并评估了最新版本的健康饮食指数 (HEI)，该指数是根据 2020-2025 年美国人膳食指南 (DGA) 发布的。首次新增两所高等教育机构，一所面向 2 岁及以上儿童和成人，一所面向 12 至 23 个月的幼儿。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230926/Toddler-diet-quality-covered-in-the-latest-version-of-the-Healthy-Eating-Index.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230926/Toddler-diet-quality-covered-in-the-latest-version-of-the-Healthy-Eating-Index.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b06dffce-c044-48c0-bd4c-26213e3cc89c Tue, 26 Sep 2023 21:16:23 -0400 Toddler diet quality covered in the latest version of the Healthy Eating Index
加沙长期电力短缺严重影响民众心理健康一项新的研究显示，长时间断电对加沙地带许多人的心理健康产生了严重影响。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230926/Prolonged-electricity-shortages-in-Gaza-have-severe-impact-on-the-peoples-mental-health.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230926/Prolonged-electricity-shortages-in-Gaza-have-severe-impact-on-the-peoples-mental-health.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=84f8fdb2-3ae1-4e49-ade0-ef30135bf996 Tue, 26 Sep 2023 20:37:00 -0400 Prolonged electricity shortages in Gaza have severe impact on the people's mental health
南加州大学凯克医学院将重点关注西班牙裔 NAFLD 患者的多组学研究南加州大学凯克医学院已获得美国国立卫生研究院的资助，作为涉及六个地点的人类健康和疾病“多组学”研究的一部分，该研究为期五年，耗资 5030 万美元。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230926/Keck-School-of-Medicine-of-USC-to-focus-on-Hispanic-患者-with-NAFLD-in-multi-omics-study。 ASPX https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230926/Keck-School-of-Medicine-of-USC-to-focus-on-Hispanic-患者-with-NAFLD-in-multi-omics-study。 aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f6ee329b-ff9a-4186-90fb-8655cd7dc673 Tue, 26 Sep 2023 20:31:39 -0400 Keck School of Medicine of USC to focus on Hispanic patients with NAFLD in multi-omics study
NIH 拨款 1020 万美元用于研究二尖瓣脱垂恶性心律失常的危险因素西奈山伊坎医学院的研究人员获得了美国国立卫生研究院国家心肺和血液研究所的 1020 万美元拨款，用于研究二尖瓣脱垂引起的恶性心律失常的危险因素。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230926/24102M-NIH-grant-awarded-to-study-risk-factors-for-malignant-arrhythmias-in-mitral-valve-prolapse.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230926/24102M-NIH-grant-awarded-to-study-risk-factors-for-malignant-arrhythmias-in-mitral-valve-prolapse.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ff60d74f-0a68-421a-887f-f2339bb13bcf Tue, 26 Sep 2023 20:24:13 -0400 $10.2M NIH grant awarded to study risk factors for malignant arrhythmias in mitral valve prolapse
研究发现近亲结合可能会增加患常见疾病的风险一项新研究发现，近亲之间的血缘关系可能会增加患 2 型糖尿病和创伤后应激障碍 (PTSD) 等常见疾病的风险。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230926/Unions- Between-close-relatives-may-increase-the-risk-of-common-diseases-study-finds.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230926/Unions- Between-close-relatives-may-increase-the-risk-of-common-diseases-study-finds.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=7e39858e-737a-4fef-973e-5c87b6988bf8 Tue, 26 Sep 2023 20:19:10 -0400 Unions between close relatives may increase the risk of common diseases, study finds
